WorkspaceId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the workspace.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z_0-9][a-zA-Z_\-0-9]*[a-zA-Z0-9]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the workspace.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:((aws)|(aws-cn)|(aws-us-gov)):iottwinmaker:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:[\/a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.:]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the workspace.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 512   

Update requires: No interruption

Role.description: The ARN of the execution role associated with the workspace.
Role.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the execution role associated with the workspace.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:((aws)|(aws-cn)|(aws-us-gov)):iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.*  

Update requires: No interruption

S3Location.description: The ARN of the S3 bucket where resources associated with the workspace are stored.
S3Location.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the S3 bucket where resources associated with the workspace are stored.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption
